title: Bodoni Hebrew - Manuale Tipography
content:
Hello typoholics, once again i need your help!  
i have one scan of the hebrew type from Bodoni's Manuale typographico (any version).  
i know that there is a beautiful new book by Taschen, that i would like get my gritty hands on.

anyway - my request is if you have that book (and a scanner, and some spare time, and willingness)  
please scan some good quality images of the hebrew types in that book (i'm attaching a sample of the only image i have).  
(i attached it in also full scale)

thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317090143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Q6Q9241_4636.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317090143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Q6Q9241_4719.jpg)
author: Yaronimus-Maximus
